<https://example.com/_index_.html>

<https://example.com/*index*.html>

<https://example.com/__index__.html>

<https://example.com/**index**.html>

<https://example.com/*******index*******.html>

<https://example.com/~~index~~.html>

<https://example.com/`index`.html>

<https://example.com/[index].html>

<mailto:_somename_@example.com>

<mailto:**somename**@example.com>

<mailto:`somename`@example.com>
